title: Xavier Becerra
added: In December 2020, Becerra was nominated for the position of [[Secretary of Health and Human Services]] by President [[Joe Biden]].<ref>https://www.nytimes.com/2020/12/06/us/politics/xavier-becerra-hhs-health-secretary.html</ref> He was confirmed by the Senate in a 50-49 vote on March 18, 2021.<ref>https://www.cnbc.com/2021/03/18/senate-to-confirm-xavier-becerra-as-hhs-secretary.html</ref>
